cofh.lib.capability

Interface IArcheryBowItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IArcheryItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcheryBowItemWrapper

    public interface IArcheryBowItem
extends IArcheryItem
    Implement this interface as a capability for a Bow Item which should be compatible with CoFH's improved archery handling. You can get really clever and add your own custom bow behavior by overriding the "fireArrow" method. By default, this method is a passthrough for CoFH's vanilla handling.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean fireArrow(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack arrow, net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter, int charge, net.minecraft.world.World world)
      This method handles the entire shooting process - these parameters are essentially passed in from the onArrowLoosed event.
      default float getAccuracyModifier(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
      Return the total accuracy multiplier for this item - LOWER IS BETTER - 1.0F is default.
      default float getDamageModifier(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
      Return the total damage multiplier for this item - 1.0F is default.
      default float getVelocityModifier(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
      Return the total arrow speed multiplier for this item - 1.0F is default.

      • Methods inherited from interface cofh.lib.capability.IArcheryItem

        onArrowLoosed

    • Method Detail

      • getAccuracyModifier

        default float getAccuracyModifier(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
        Return the total accuracy multiplier for this item - LOWER IS BETTER - 1.0F is default. Note that weapons and ammo can BOTH have this!
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player holding the bow.
        Returns:
        Total accuracy modifier - 0.5F means arrows will shoot with half as much variance.

      • getDamageModifier

        default float getDamageModifier(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
        Return the total damage multiplier for this item - 1.0F is default. Note that weapons and ammo can BOTH have this!
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player holding the bow.
        Returns:
        Total damage modifier - 1.1F would be 10% more.

      • getVelocityModifier

        default float getVelocityModifier(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter)
        Return the total arrow speed multiplier for this item - 1.0F is default. Note that weapons and ammo can BOTH have this!
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player holding the bow.
        Returns:
        Total speed modifier - as an example, 1.1F would be 10% more.

      • fireArrow

        boolean fireArrow(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack arrow,
                  net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity shooter,
                  int charge,
                  net.minecraft.world.World world)
        This method handles the entire shooting process - these parameters are essentially passed in from the onArrowLoosed event.
        Parameters:
        arrow - ItemStack representing the ammo.
        shooter - Player holding the bow.
        charge - Amount of time the bow has been drawn.
        world - World object, used to spawn the arrow.
        Returns:
        TRUE if an arrow was actually fired.
